	The gameplay however, is a whole other story, it blows. I guess that's the same story as the pricing because it sucks too. You get to play as a bunch of gay dudes where you run around like a headless chicken trying to pop open power boxes that when you flick the switch plays a funny sound maker.  The funny sound maker then alerts every single Michael Myers within the 15 square foot arena that youâ€™re trying to escape, and walks with his fucking jetpack spring shoes at the speed of sound.  You try to run away and instantly die because he spent 6.99 forJason McFreddy Fazbear. Being a survivor is shit. The game is a horror game because you saw the Texas Chainsaw Massacre in theaters and was a little frightened so they put him in the game. How awful!  But if youâ€™re expecting your heart to beat when youâ€™re hiding in the foliage as he walks by, well, that doesnâ€™t happen because he doesnâ€™t walk by, he just cuts your head off.

Playing as the scary zombie monster is the easiest thing one could possibly do.  You are flying around the map on your 4x4 ATV Quad and you have x-ray hairline, infrared vision, gamma ray blasting nutsacks, microwave fingernails, and visible light nothin because theyâ€™re dark and scary. After walking through walls and teleporting to some shmuck whoâ€™s trying his best to do the objective, you can just left click on him and kill him. This paragraph might be short, but the killer half of the game is just as shallow, boring, and simple as I outline above.

I canâ€™t fault the paid dlc for being predatory against people, because technically you arenâ€™t forced to buy it. But this begs the moral question, are people with 47 chromosomes technically human? This is disgusting, and Behaviour Digital Inc. is morally bankrupt for publicly admitting this. I donâ€™t know what else to write about this game. This game is terrible and I strongly advise against you playing this. I know you likely arenâ€™t reading negative reviews, but I truly hope you take this one to heart. I am one of the strongest advocates against this game and for good reason. It is hot shit, and I know youâ€™ll agree with me when you play 20 minutes, puke, and refund it as soon as possible. Thank you for reading my review, and donâ€™t buy this game. 

P.S. Behaviour Digital Inc.: If you are reading this fuck you, fuck your game, and fuck you for making this game. You guys are all bald sacks of shit and do something worthwhile with your development time like seeing how many flights of stairs you have jump down to die. Thank you for giving me substance to shit on, your game sucks.

P.P.S I have insider info that the next update will release a Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 Chopper Gunner as the next killer, for 39.99 I'm looking forward to circling he map in a AH-64 Apache helicopter using a 30mm chain gun to destroy every sad sorry survivor. Black Ops 2 Michael Myers gamemode is infinitely more fun than Dead by Gaylight, and it also has funny zombies mode.

This is a super fun game (especially with friends). There are a couple of items/add-ons/perks that promote toxic game-play and some bugs that are pretty annoying to deal with. The pip/ranking system is pretty stupid. There's not a lot of people at high ranks, so you're stuck long wait times for a 5-15 minuted game. I get why there's a ranking system (so that new players are put up against experienced players, despite this still happening).
Just don't take the game a serious as a competitive game and have fun with it. You'll appreciate the game more that way.
